TopicTitle: [1.1.2] Take Command - Launch Kerbals in External Command Seats [v1.4.1 - May 6, 2016]

Articles.Content:
OK. Calm down. 

Was only checking if there was any news. 

I didn't expect the Spanish Inquisition.

> 
> 
> On 11/20/2016 at 1:20 PM, GFX5000i said:
> 
> 
> if you change the check from **vessel.HoldPhysics == false** to **vessel.HoldPhysics == true** the transfer will happen before the physics is activated and if you remove this verification completely the transfer can happen anytime.  
> 
> I've been using without it for some time and doesn't seem to have any problem while solving the phantom forces.
> 

I'm going to test this, if it works in my testing, I'll release a 1.2.2 version in a day or so

It's passed my testing, look for a release later this evening.

thanks to [@GFX5000i](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/170968-gfx5000i/) for the fix

LGG

New thread for new release:
